CIPHER.0.cipherString: I told everybody that I was going to be an actress in Hollywood one day. People looked at me like I was crazy.
CIPHER.0.question: Solve this aristocrat.

CIPHER.1.cipherString: As an actor, you try to bring as much of yourself to a part to try and create a feeling of authenticity and emotional truth and resonance.

CIPHER.2.cipherString: America, which has the most glorious present still existing in the world today, hardly stops to enjoy it, in her insatiable appetite for the future.

CIPHER.3.cipherString: Maybe if I could ever be a successful comedian then I could be an example that Christians can also have fun.

CIPHER.4.cipherString: I almost never listen to the radio.

CIPHER.5.cipherString: Anarchy is the only slight glimmer of hope.

CIPHER.8.cipherString: I had turned my anxiety into my profession.

CIPHER.9.cipherString: All serious daring starts from within.
CIPHER.9.question: Decode this quote which has been encoded using the Baconian cipher.

CIPHER.16.cipherString: In the game of football, you can never be too sure of anything.

CIPHER.17.cipherString: It is important to know who killed Jack Kennedy and why.

CIPHER.18.cipherString: It is a rare life that remains orderly even in private.

CIPHER.22.cipherString: What is called for is dignity. We need to set an example.

CIPHER.23.cipherString: No amount of manifest absurdity…could deter those who wanted to believe from believing.

CIPHER.24.cipherString: I'm just not one of those people who thought having biological children was that important, to me it was more about wanting to raise a child.

CIPHER.25.cipherString: To me, all war is failure for humanity, though it often is a bounty for commerce.
